summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 7, plat of Sunrise Heights, being the alley between 31st Avenue Southwest and 30th Avenue Southwest from Southwest Othello Street to Southwest Myrtle Street; by paving the same, by doing such grading or regarding as may be necessary, providing for the necessary surface drainage; in accord with Resolution 27126 of the City Council of the City of Seattle; creating Local Improvement District No.6741 and providing for payment of the cost and expense of the improvement from the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund and by special assessments upon property within the district.
